statement.tex: \text{Find all the points of discontinuity}\\ \text{of f defined as }f(x) = \vert x\vert - \vert x+1\vert.

step.context: \text{Which of the following shows the}\\ \text{correct definitions for }\vert x\vert\text{ and }\vert x+1\vert ?
step.reason: \text{The tricky function is }\vert x+1\vert. \\ \text{And the trick is to see }\vert x + 1\vert \text{ as }\vert y \vert\\ \text{where } y = x + 1.
